referenceObject.reference: Machado, M., Teixeira, R. A. & Milledge, G. A. (2019). On the Australian bark crab spider genus Stephanopis: taxonomic review and description of seven new species (Araneae: Thomisidae: Stephanopinae). Records of the Australian Museum 71(6): 217-276.
